siteConfig.title: Tarang 2026
siteConfig.tagline: The Spectrum of Technology and Culture

departments.name: Civil Engineering
departments.description: The Civil Engineering department brings the world of structural innovation to Tarang. Compete in events that test your ability to design, build, and analyze real-world construction challenges.

departmentEvents.title: Bridge Building Challenge
departmentEvents.desc: Design and construct a model bridge using popsicle sticks. The bridge must sustain maximum load while maintaining structural elegance.
rules: Judged on load-bearing capacity and aesthetics

departmentEvents.title: Surveying Competition
departmentEvents.desc: Demonstrate your surveying skills using theodolite and leveling instruments in a timed field exercise.

departmentEvents.title: Estimation Quiz
departmentEvents.desc: Test your knowledge of estimation, costing, and quantity surveying in this rapid-fire technical quiz.

departmentEvents.title: CAD Design Challenge
departmentEvents.desc: Design a building plan using AutoCAD within the given time. Judged on accuracy, detailing, and creativity.

departmentEvents.title: Concrete Cube Testing
departmentEvents.desc: Prepare and test concrete cube specimens. Demonstrate your understanding of mix design and material properties.

departments.name: Electrical & Electronics
departments.description: The Electrical & Electronics department powers up Tarang with electrifying competitions. From circuit design to electrical machine troubleshooting, showcase your expertise in power and electronics.

departmentEvents.title: Circuit Debugging
departmentEvents.desc: Find and fix faults in complex electrical circuits within a time limit. Speed and precision are key!

departmentEvents.title: Wiring Competition
departmentEvents.desc: Complete domestic and industrial wiring setups with precision. Neatness, safety, and speed all count.

departmentEvents.title: Electrical Quiz Bowl
departmentEvents.desc: Battle through multiple rounds of questions covering electrical machines, power systems, and electronics fundamentals.

departmentEvents.title: Transformer Design Challenge
departmentEvents.desc: Design and wind a small transformer to meet specified voltage and current ratings.

departmentEvents.title: PLC Programming Contest
departmentEvents.desc: Program a PLC to control an automated sequence. Demonstrate your industrial automation skills.

departments.name: Electronics Engineering
departments.description: The Electronics Engineering department brings cutting-edge digital and analog challenges to Tarang. From embedded systems to communication circuits, test your electronics prowess.

departmentEvents.title: PCB Design Challenge
departmentEvents.desc: Design a PCB layout for a given circuit schematic using EDA tools. Precision and optimization are key.

departmentEvents.title: Arduino Challenge
departmentEvents.desc: Build a working prototype using Arduino to solve a real-world problem. Creativity meets electronics!

departmentEvents.title: Signal Processing Quiz
departmentEvents.desc: Test your knowledge of analog and digital signal processing, communication systems, and VLSI.

departmentEvents.title: Soldering Challenge
departmentEvents.desc: Assemble a working electronic circuit on a PCB through expert soldering. Speed and quality matter!

departmentEvents.title: IoT Innovation Challenge
departmentEvents.desc: Build an IoT-based solution for smart campus or home automation using NodeMCU or ESP32.

departments.name: Mechanical Engineering
departments.description: The Mechanical Engineering department brings raw engineering power to Tarang. From precision machining to innovative design challenges, prove your mechanical mastery.

departmentEvents.title: CAD Modelling Contest
departmentEvents.desc: Create precision 3D models using SolidWorks or Fusion 360. Creativity meets engineering accuracy.

departmentEvents.title: Lathe Machining Challenge
departmentEvents.desc: Demonstrate your machining skills on a lathe. Precision turning operations within tight tolerances.

departmentEvents.title: IC Engine Quiz
departmentEvents.desc: A rapid-fire quiz covering thermodynamics, IC engines, automobile engineering, and manufacturing processes.

departmentEvents.title: Welding Competition
departmentEvents.desc: Showcase your arc welding expertise. Create strong, clean welds and demonstrate proper technique.
rules: Judged on weld quality and appearance

departmentEvents.title: Mechanism Design Challenge
departmentEvents.desc: Design and build a working mechanical mechanism using provided materials to perform a specified task.

departmentEvents.title: Technical Paper Presentation
departmentEvents.desc: Present your research on emerging topics in mechanical engineering to a panel of experts.

departments.name: Textile Technology
departments.description: The Textile Technology department weaves creativity into Tarang with unique events that blend technical knowledge with artistic design. Explore the science behind fabrics and fashion.

departmentEvents.title: Fabric Identification Challenge
departmentEvents.desc: Identify different types of fabrics, fibers, and weave patterns through visual and tactile examination.

departmentEvents.title: Draping & Design Contest
departmentEvents.desc: Create an innovative garment design using draping techniques on a mannequin with provided fabrics.

departmentEvents.title: Textile Quiz
departmentEvents.desc: Test your knowledge covering textile fibers, spinning, weaving, dyeing, and fabric finishing processes.

departmentEvents.title: Natural Dyeing Workshop
departmentEvents.desc: Learn and demonstrate eco-friendly natural dyeing techniques using plant-based dyes on cotton fabric.

departmentEvents.title: Pattern Making Challenge
departmentEvents.desc: Create accurate garment patterns from given specifications. Precision and speed determine the winner.

departments.name: Wood & Paper Technology
departments.description: The Wood & Paper Technology department showcases the art and science of wood craftsmanship and paper engineering. From furniture design to paper testing, explore sustainable material technologies.

departmentEvents.title: Wood Carving Contest
departmentEvents.desc: Create intricate wood carvings using hand tools. Artistry and craftsmanship take center stage.

departmentEvents.title: Furniture Design Challenge
departmentEvents.desc: Design a functional furniture piece using sustainable wood materials. Innovation meets sustainability.

departmentEvents.title: Paper Testing Quiz
departmentEvents.desc: Test your knowledge of paper properties, pulping processes, and quality testing methodologies.

departmentEvents.title: Wood Identification Challenge
departmentEvents.desc: Identify different wood species through visual examination, grain patterns, and physical properties.

departmentEvents.title: Joinery Skills Competition
departmentEvents.desc: Demonstrate your woodworking joinery skills by creating precise wood joints using hand tools.

events.title: Project Expo
events.desc: Showcase innovative projects from all departments. Present your best engineering solutions to a panel of experts.

events.title: Quiz Competition
events.desc: Test your knowledge across technology, science, and general engineering in this multi-round quiz battle.

events.title: Circuit Debugging
events.desc: Find and fix faults in complex circuits within a time limit. Speed and precision are key!

events.title: CAD Modelling
events.desc: Design precision 3D models using CAD software. Creativity meets engineering accuracy.

events.title: Seminar Presentation
events.desc: Present your research papers on emerging technologies and innovative engineering solutions.

events.title: Bridge Building
events.desc: Design and construct model bridges to withstand maximum load. Test your structural engineering skills.

events.title: Line Follower Robot
events.desc: Build autonomous robots that can follow a path with speed and precision.

events.title: Treasure Hunt
events.desc: A thrilling campus-wide hunt combining tech puzzles, riddles, and physical challenges.

events.title: Nrityanjali ‚Äî Group Dance
events.desc: Showcase your dance moves in this group dance competition spanning classical, folk, and contemporary styles.

events.title: Solo Singing
events.desc: Let your voice shine! Perform any song of your choice and capture the hearts of the audience.

events.title: Mime & Skit
events.desc: Tell compelling stories through mime or short skits. Creativity and expression take center stage.

events.title: Photography Contest
events.desc: Capture the spirit of Tarang through your lens. Best shots across categories win prizes.

events.title: Fashion Show
events.desc: Walk the ramp with confidence and style. Showcase creativity in costume design and performance.

events.title: Art & Poster Making
events.desc: Express your artistic vision on canvas. Themes will be revealed on the spot.

events.name: Opening Ceremony
events.desc: Grand inauguration by chief guest

events.name: Technical Events Begin
events.desc: Project Expo, Quiz, Circuit Debugging, CAD

events.name: Art & Poster Making
events.desc: Spot theme art competition

events.name: Treasure Hunt
events.desc: Campus-wide puzzle adventure

events.name: Solo Singing Prelims
events.desc: Singing auditions and selection

events.name: Department Tech Events
events.desc: Department-wise technical competitions

events.name: Photography Walk
events.desc: Campus photo challenge begins

events.name: Cultural Evening
events.desc: Open stage performances and jamming

events.name: Paper Presentations
events.desc: Research paper competition

events.name: Bridge Building & Robotics
events.desc: Bridge Building, Line Follower Robot

events.name: Mime & Skit
events.desc: Drama and mime performances

events.name: Solo Singing Finals
events.desc: Final round of singing competition

events.name: Group Dance ‚Äî Nrityanjali
events.desc: Grand inter-department dance battle

events.name: Fashion Show
events.desc: The grand ramp walk showcase

events.name: Awards & Prize Distribution
events.desc: Valedictory function with prizes

events.name: Closing Ceremony
events.desc: Grand finale and vote of thanks

faq.question: Who can participate in Tarang 2026?
faq.answer: Tarang is primarily for students of Government Polytechnic College Kannur, but inter-college participants may be allowed for select events. A valid college ID is required.

faq.question: When and where is Tarang 2026?
faq.answer: Tarang 2026 will be held on March 12 & 13, 2026 at the Government Polytechnic College Kannur campus.

faq.question: Is there a registration fee?
faq.answer: Registration details will be announced soon. Some events may have a nominal fee. Keep an eye on our social media for updates.

faq.question: Can I participate in multiple events?
faq.answer: Yes! You can participate in as many events as you want, as long as they don't overlap in schedule.

faq.question: Which departments host technical events?
faq.answer: All six departments ‚Äî Civil, Electrical & Electronics, Electronics, Mechanical, Textile Technology, and Wood & Paper Technology ‚Äî host their own technical events.

faq.question: How are the events organized?
faq.answer: Day 1 focuses on technical events, quizzes, art, and prelims. Day 2 features finals, cultural performances, fashion show, and the grand closing ceremony.
